text: Alfredo del Diestro (1885–1951) was Chilean actor and film director.Ramírez Berg p.69 ==Selected filmography== *Revolution (aka Pancho Villa's Shadow, 1932) *Godfather Mendoza (1933) *Prisoner 13 (1933) *The Crying Woman (1933) * Nothing More Than a Woman (1934) * Juarez and Maximillian (1934) * Gold and Silver (1934) * Heroic Silence (1935) * Neither Blood Nor Sand (1941) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Charles Ramírez Berg. The Classical Mexican Cinema: The Poetics of the Exceptional Golden Age Films. University of Texas Press, 2015. ==External links== * Category:1885 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Chilean male film actors Category:Chilean film directors Category:People from Valparaíso
title: Alfredo del Diestro
